SEARCH
Package geometries

Interface Intersectable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Geometry
All Known Implementing Classes:
Cylinder, Plane, Polygon, RadialGeometry, Sphere, Triangle, Tube
public interface Intersectable
The Intersectable interface represents objects that can be intersected by rays.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Point>
    findIntersections(Ray ray)
    Finds the intersection points of the specified ray with the geometric shape.

  • Method Details

    • findIntersections

      List<Point> findIntersections(Ray ray)
      Finds the intersection points of the specified ray with the geometric shape.
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray to check for intersections with the geometric shape
      Returns:
      a list of points where the ray intersects the geometric shape, or an empty list if there are no intersections
